statements: SELECT * FROM market_trends_gmo;
SELECT id, product_name, consumer_preference FROM market_trends_gmo ORDER BY consumer_preference DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, market_trend FROM market_trends_gmo WHERE date_recorded = '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, market_trend FROM market_trends_gmo WHERE consumer_preference = 'High';
SELECT id, product_name, date_recorded FROM market_trends_gmo ORDER BY date_recorded ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, market_trend FROM market_trends_gmo WHERE consumer_preference = 'High'
SELECT * FROM market_trends_gmo ORDER BY date_recorded DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, market_trend FROM market_trends_gmo WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT MAX(id) AS max_id, MIN(id) AS min_id FROM market_trends_gmo
SELECT DISTINCT consumer_preference FROM market_trends_gmo
SELECT product_name, market_price FROM market_trends;
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE market_demand > 100;
SELECT product_name, category, market_price FROM market_trends ORDER BY market_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, market_price FROM market_trends WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, market_price FROM market_trends WHERE market_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT product_name, category, market_price FROM market_trends WHERE market_price > 100 ORDER BY market_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, category, market_demand FROM market_trends WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_name ASC, market_demand DESC;

SELECT product_name, market_price, feedback FROM market_trends JOIN consumer_preferences ON market_trends.product_id = consumer_preferences.product_id WHERE consumer_preferences.rating > 4 ORDER BY market_price ASC, consumer_preferences.rating DESC;

SELECT market_price, product_name, consumer_name, rating FROM market_trends JOIN consumer_preferences ON market_trends.product_id = consumer_preferences.product_id WHERE market_price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY market_price ASC, rating DESC;
SELECT MAX(market_price) AS max_price, AVG(market_demand) AS avg_demand FROM market_trends WHERE category = 'Clothing';
SELECT * FROM ProductSales ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM ProductSales WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, rating FROM ConsumerFeedback WHERE rating >= 4 AND product_name = 'Product A';
SELECT id, market_segment, consumer_preference FROM MarketTrends WHERE market_segment = 'Technology' AND consumer_preference = 'High';
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends;
SELECT id, product_name, market_segment FROM MarketTrends WHERE market_segment='Electronics';
SELECT product_name, sale_date, quantity, price FROM ProductSales WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, rating FROM ConsumerFeedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY product_name, id;
SELECT product_name, feedback_text FROM ConsumerFeedback WHERE rating < 3 AND product_name LIKE '%Gadget%';
SELECT * FROM Market_Trends;
SELECT product_name, market_demand FROM Market_Trends WHERE market_demand > 100;
SELECT id, consumer_id, preferred_product_name FROM Consumer_Preferences ORDER BY consumer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Product_Inventory WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_information FROM Supplier_Information WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Corp%';
SELECT * FROM Market_Trends WHERE market_demand > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, product_name, consumer_feedback FROM Market_Trends WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT product_name, quantity_available, expiration_date FROM Product_Inventory WHERE quantity_available < 50 ORDER BY expiration_date;
SELECT preferred_product_name, purchase_history->>'last_purchase_date' AS last_purchase_date FROM Consumer_Preferences WHERE consumer_id = 1234;
SELECT supplier_name, product_categories FROM Supplier_Information WHERE JSON_ARRAY_LENGTH(product_categories) > 3;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends ORDER BY trend_date DESC, product_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, product_name, market_segment FROM MarketTrends WHERE market_share > 0.5 AND trend_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY market_share DESC;
SELECT product_name, market_share AS share_percentage, trend_date FROM MarketTrends WHERE market_segment = 'Electronics' AND trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT product_name, trend_description FROM MarketTrends WHERE market_segment = 'Food' AND trend_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, market_share, trend_date FROM MarketTrends WHERE market_segment = 'Fashion' AND market_share < 0.3 OR market_share IS NULL ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends ORDER BY trend_date DESC, market_share DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, market_segment, trend_description FROM MarketTrends WHERE market_segment = 'Technology' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, price FROM ProductDetails pd JOIN SupplierInformation si ON pd.supplier_id = si.id WHERE si.location = 'USA';
SELECT id, consumer_name, product_preference, purchase_frequency FROM ConsumerPreferences WHERE purchase_frequency > 10 ORDER BY purchase_frequency DESC;

SELECT ph->>'purchase_date' as purchase_date, ph->>'quantity' as quantity FROM ConsumerPreferences cp, jsonb_array_elements(cp.purchase_history) AS ph WHERE cp.id = '6a7a4a41-4fed-4f97-8c32-3b4c43a51b70' LIMIT 5;
